Text.text: Your guide to Business Technology Platform (BTP)
Help you starting with BTP in no time by:
I'll be your personal BTP mentor by:
I can guide you to setup your BTP landscape to your needs using:
Based on hands-on experience I can assist you with your BTP Governance:
Going to Cloud makes companies more vulnerable. I'll make sure you do this in the most secure way possible by focussing on:
BTP is designed to integrate with Cloud and On-Premise to close the gap! I can help you to connect it with:
On-Premise systems using the Cloud Connector
Any SAP Cloud Solution you need in BTP

BTP is designed for extending SAP Cloud solutions and SAP On-Premise systems by building applications to keep your core clean! As a developer, I can build applications in BTP but I can also help you and your team building applications in BTP to make extensions on any of your SAP Cloud solutions or On-Premise systems for adapting it to your needs using:

BTP offers new type of applications which requires to update the skills of your developer. I can build applications for you but I can also teach and mentor your developers to use the following technologies in BTP:
It is not because the app looks good that the code looks good. Avoid bugs, keep maintenance low and have happy end users by applying the following:
Avoid suprises when going to production with a good DevOps setup in BTP using:
Building applications in BTP provides different runtime possibilities which requires a clear strategy based on your developers! I can provide guidance to choose the best options for your needs:
Migrate apps from NEO to CF
Migrate apps from On-Premise to CF
Update apps config/tooling to the latest version
